com.mixer.interactive.event.connection

Class ConnectionClosedEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mixer.interactive.event.InteractiveEvent
      • com.mixer.interactive.event.connection.ConnectionEvent
        • com.mixer.interactive.event.connection.ConnectionClosedEvent

  • public class ConnectionClosedEvent
extends ConnectionEvent
    Interactive event posted when a websocket connection to the Interactive service is closed.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Microsoft Corporation

      • ConnectionClosedEvent

        public ConnectionClosedEvent(Number projectVersionID,
                             URI interactiveHostURI,
                             Number code,
                             String message,
                             boolean closedRemotely)
        Initializes a new ConnectionClosedEvent.
        Parameters:
        projectVersionID - The project version ID for the Interactive integration
        interactiveHostURI - URI for the connected Interactive service host
        code - HTTP status code
        message - HTTP status message
        closedRemotely - true if the connected was closed remotely, false otherwise
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        InteractiveWebSocketClient.onClose(int, String, boolean)
